FuncDef: The display bgp vpnv4 routing-table statistics command displays statistics about BGP VPNv4 routes. The display bgp vpnv4 routing-table statistics command displays statistics about BGP VPNv4 routes.
CLIs: display bgp vpnv4 { all | vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> } routing-tablestatistics

ParaDef.Info:
Displays BGP routing information of VPNv4 and VPN instances.
-

Displays the BGP routing information of the specified VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. The VPN instance name cannot be _public_. If the character string is quoted by double quotation marks, the character string can contain spaces.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display bgp vpnv4 all routing-table statistics
